SELECT Extent1.CRC_STATE_ID, Extent1.CRC_STATE_REF_NO, Extent1.CRC_STATE_RUNNG_NO, Extent1.CRC_STATE_ACC_ID, Extent1.CRC_STATE_REM, Extent1.CRC_STATE_ADJ, Extent1.CRC_STATE_REFUND, Extent1.CRC_STATE_CRT_USER_ID, Extent1.CRC_STATE_TOT, Extent1.CRC_STATE_REF_DT, Extent1.CRC_STATE_CRT_DT, Extent2.ACC_CODE, Extent2.ACC_DESC, Extent3.USER_NAME, Extent4.STUS_CODE_ID, Extent4.NAME, Extent5.CRC_TRNSC_ID, Extent5.CRC_TRNSC_DT, Extent5.CRC_TRNSC_NO, Extent5.CRC_TRNSC_APPV, Extent5.CRC_TRNSC_MID, Extent5.CRC_TRNSC_REF_NO, Extent5.CRC_TRNSC_AMT FROM PAY0075D Extent1 LEFT OUTER JOIN PAY0076D Extent5 ON Extent1.CRC_STATE_ID = Extent5.CRC_STATE_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SYS0001M Extent2 ON Extent1.CRC_STATE_ACC_ID = Extent2.ACC_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SYS0047M Extent3 ON Extent1.CRC_STATE_CRT_USER_ID = Extent3.USER_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SYS0038M Extent4 ON Extent1.CRC_STATE_STUS_ID = Extent4.STUS_CODE_ID WHERE 1=1
AND Extent1.CRC_STATE_REF_NO = #{refNo} /* reference no. */
AND Extent4.STUS_CODE_ID IN ('1','36') /* status (1: active / 36:inactive) */
AND Extent4.STUS_CODE_ID = #{status} /* status (1: active / 36:inactive) */
AND Extent1.CRC_STATE_ACC_ID = #{account} /* Account accID */
AND Extent1.CRC_STATE_CRT_DT >= TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{updateDt1},'DD/MM/YYYY'),'YYYYMMDD') || '000000','yyyymmddhh24miss') /* upload date */ AND Extent1.CRC_STATE_CRT_DT < TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{updateDt2},'DD/MM/YYYY'),'YYYYMMDD') || '000000','yyyymmddhh24miss') + 1 /* upload date */
/* --AND Extent1.CRC_STATE_REM LIKE '' --remark 화면 조건 없음 --AND Extent3.USER_NAME LIKE '' -- 화면 조건 없음 */

SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYMM') || '_' ||LPAD(SUBSTR(NVL(MAX(CRC_STATE_RUNNG_NO),'0000'),-4,4) + 1,4,'0') AS runningNO FROM PAY0075D WHERE CRC_STATE_ID = (SELECT MAX(CRC_STATE_ID) AS MAXVAL FROM PAY0075D) AND SUBSTR(CRC_STATE_RUNNG_NO,-9,4) = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYMM')
mapper.update: INSERT INTO PAY0075D ( CRC_STATE_ID, CRC_STATE_REF_DT, CRC_STATE_REF_NO, CRC_STATE_RUNNG_NO, CRC_STATE_ACC_ID, CRC_STATE_REM, CRC_STATE_STUS_ID, CRC_STATE_ADJ, CRC_STATE_REFUND, CRC_STATE_CRT_DT, CRC_STATE_CRT_USER_ID, CRC_STATE_UPLOAD_DT, CRC_STATE_UPLOAD_USER_ID, CRC_STATE_TOT) VALUES ( #{crcStateId}, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{crcStateRefDt},'DD/MM/YYYY'),'YYYY-MM-DD'), GET_DOCNO('110'), #{crcStateRunngNo}, #{crcStateAccId}, '', 1, 0, 0, SYSDATE, 4238, SYSDATE, 4238, #{crcStateTot} )

SELECT PAY0076D_SEQ.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
